channel.title: Pvp?
channel.description:
Yes i know the rules, yes yes, but why dont moparscape add a requestions page. I've seen many ppl requesting about codes and such.
If anyone got this or bored/wanna make it for me id be very thankfull. Also i'm searching a Command/NPC Command like ::pvpon for mod+ Everything become wild but you wont loose stuff. Or the NPC you can talk to him and he ask "Want to turn PVP mode on?"
Cmon. I'm using Delta, but if it doens't work on that ill change. PM me code or realese public!

item.title: Pvp?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

We don’t make a request page, because we don’t spoon-feed.

Read full topic
